select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by updatetime desc,createtime desc) as row, a.*,b.Name as CategoryName,HotelName=isnull(h.HotelName,''),HotelID=isnull(h.HotelID,0) from WeixinMaterial a inner join WeixinMaterialCategory b on a.CategoryId=b.Id left join WeixinMaterialHotelRel rel on rel.MaterialID=a.IDX left join HotelDB..Hotel (nolock) h on h.HotelID=Rel.HotelID where 1=1 and a.State=1 and a.CategoryId=@type and (Title like '%'+@Key+'%' or Digest like '%'+@Key+'%' or Author like '%'+@Key+'%' ) ) A where a.row between @Start and @End
